content: That's really helpful, thanks! My mom will definitely appreciate those tips. By the way, I've been thinking about my own life and trying to prioritize my relationships with my family. I've been trying to spend more time with my niece and cousins, and I've even started taking a cooking class with my mom every Wednesday evening. It's been really great to bond with her and learn some new recipes. Do you have any advice on how to maintain these relationships and make them even stronger?
